And so I think the step forward in negative emissions technologies is some kind of system that has reduced energy requirements. I mean towards uh Adam's comment about uh like perspective pieces, one of the the National Academies put out a study on direct air carbon removal systems and they had uh the from what I I don't model this directly, I model the energy requirements. So the the biggest thing problem that I see now is the high uh thermal process requirements.
